glsa.title: Pacemaker: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Pacemaker, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Pacemaker is an Open Source, High Availability resource manager suitable for both small and large clusters.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Pacemaker. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code or a local attacker could escalate privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Pacemaker users should upgrade to the latest version:
